text: Umayya ibn Abd Shams is the man, the clan of Banu Umayyad is named after. Umayya was the adopted son of Abd Shams ibn Abd Manaf and the father of Harb ibn Umayya and Abu al-'As. == References == Category:Family of Muhammad Category:Year of death missing Category:510s births
title: Umayya ibn Abd Shams
